Hearing that the no. 13 of Ludwig Van Beethoven sounded crap, I thought I might just listen it up as well, and it turns out that the bad quality isn't the most surprising, but the fact, that this piece isn't " Ludwig van Beethoven - Symphony No. 7 (Op. 92)", but in fact the "Piano Sonata #14 Adagio Sostenuto" - which is better known as the Moonlight Sonata.
